home.title: Beis Knesses of New Milford
home.welcome: Welcome to the community, join us for prayer, learning, and connection.

about.description: Under the auspices of Rav Yosef Weinberger, our goal is to create a vibrant kehillah and makom torah/tefillah with a broad appeal accomplished by organic programming that is experiential and instills passion towards Judaism. We hope that we can establish a warm, friendly and welcoming atmosphere that allows our families to be religiously inspired and growth oriented.

rabbi.name: Rav Yosef Weinberger
rabbi.bio: Rav Yosef Weinberger is a Rebbe and coordinator of the Beit Midrash Track in Yeshivat Frisch. He graduated from Yeshiva University's Sy Syms School of Business where he received a BS in Accounting and subsequently completed the CPA examination. Upon graduation, he earned semicha from RIETS, as part of the Wexner Semicha Honors Program, as well as a Master's from the Azrieli Graduate School of Jewish Education.

donate.title: Donate to Beis Knesses of New Milford
donate.description: Support our shul with a donation or membership.

membership.title: Membership
membership.description: Membership is broken down into two components, the first being regular operating membership- supporting the shul's costs to run programming. An additional component is a building membership, which is used to support the shul's efforts to establish and sustain a physical location to allow the shul to scale and grow. Note: Both components are being offered at reduced rates vs the shul costs in recognition of the need to support the growing community.
membership.formText: Please submit the form below to apply for membership:
